name: Star Runner
summary: Fight, upgrade & explore! Star Runner presents you with an endless procedurally generated galaxy to explore with various enemies and an expansive upgrade system. Star Runner is a rouge-inspired crawler with a sci-fi setting. Explore a procedurally generated "dungeon" of enemies, asteroids, structures and loot randomised each time you set out from your home world. Earn money and upgrade your ship with skins, paint jobs, stat improvements and weapon types. A tough permadeath system: if you can't make it back to your home world, you lose everything. Quick to play: complete a run in minutes, or spend hours going deeper and deeper!
